sourceMeaningMnemonic: The kanji and the radical are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
meaningInfo: If you know the radical, you will know the kanji as well!
readingMnemonic: Such <kanji>righteousness</kanji>! Well, at least according to the king who thinks he's being righteous. His version of righteousness is to send anyone who disagrees with him to the <reading>gui</reading>llotine (<ja>ぎ</ja>).
readingInfo: "THIS IS NOT RIGHTEOUSNESS!" you yell, just before the guillotine comes down on your neck.
